I'm talking felony nudity conviction. Six months minimum. This wouldn't only ruin your friend's scholarship, it'll screw any chances either of you will ever have of rising above food-stamps and quicky-mart careers. Capiche? That's why we're gonna need both of you to do exactly as told.".

The unscrupulous officers then decide on -
153.title: Handcuffed Naked Teenage Babes

1532.content:
"Alright, darling," the cop with the Southern accent said to the still crying Raven, "here's what's gonna happen."

Raven looked around her. She could see only darkness, trees dimly visible in the car's headlights. "Where -- where are we? What are you going to do to me? Where's Chloe?" She didn't know how long it had been since the cops had put her in the back of one of their patrol cars and Chloe in the other. They had then driven off in different directions. Where they were now, Raven had no idea. She sort of thought, however, that they were probably still within the park preserve.

Things had been a little frosty between them since she had tried to throw Chloe under the bus. She was hoping Chloe would forgive her.

"Hey, hey, hey," the cop said. "Did I ask you to say anything? I talk, you listen. Understand?"

Meekly, still cowed, Raven nodded.

"Good. We're at one side of the park. Now, my partner has your little slut friend with him. He's gonna take her to the other side of the park. He's gonna let her go, I'm gonna let you go. You have to make your way back to the same side of the lake where we found you, and meet your friend there. If she's not there yet, you wait for her. If she gets there first, she'll wait for you. Understand so far?"

Raven nodded.

"While you are doing this, my associate and I are going to be out looking for you. We are pretty good at tracking you, so we'll probably find you."

"What happens if you find us?"

"Then we make you do something for us, and we let you keep going once it's done."

"What sort of thing?"

"You'll find out. We'll tell you when it happens."

Raven nodded.

"You have to make it there by the time the sun comes up. If you do that, we let you and your friend go. If either of you ain't there by the time the sun comes up, we arrest you both."

Again, Raven nodded.

"Any questions?"

"How far is it to the lake?"

"It's a fair distance. If you keep moving and moving fairly quickly, you should make it in plenty of time."

"Which direction is it?"

"Well, now, I ain't tellin' you. You'll just have to figure it out."

"Will you take these handcuffs off me?"

"Thanks for reminding me," the cop said. He got out his car. He opened the back door. Taking Raven by the shoulder, he guided her out of the car. Once she was standing next to his car, he unlocked one of the bracelets of her handcuffs.

"Turn around."

Once Raven was facing him, he told her, "Hold your hands out."

Raven held her hands in front of him. He fastened the bracelet around her wrist again, cuffing her hands in front this time.

"Don't want to make things too easy for you," he said as Raven looked at her cuffs hands.

"Will I be able to do this with my hands cuffed like this?"

"You'd better hope so. Any more questions?"

Raven shook her head.

"Then I suggest you get going."
